Name: aortic atherosclerosis
Definition: A leprosy that results in small numerous red irregularly shaped plaques.

Name: obsolete Histoplasma capsulatum pericarditis
Definition: An American histoplasmosis that results_in inflammation located_in pericardium

Name: cerebral atherosclerosis
Definition: A chronic salpingitis that is caused by gonorrhea.

Name: generalized atherosclerosis
Definition: An inherited metabolic disorder that involves plasma protein metabolism malfunction.
